meanings.definition: A chemical compound used in photography as a developing agent.
meanings.sent1: The amidol helped bring out the images on the film.
meanings.sent2: Photographers often rely on amidol for developing their photos.
meanings.sent3: The amidol in the darkroom seemed to have a mind of its own!
meanings.sent4: The amidol worked its magic, transforming the blank paper into a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The pungent smell of amidol filled the air, signaling the start of the developing process.

meanings.definition: In the middle of; surrounded by.
meanings.sent1: She found herself amidol a sea of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The cozy cabin was nestled amidol the tall trees.
meanings.sent3: Lost amidol the bustling city, he finally found his way with a map.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts swirled amidol a whirlwind of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The tiny island was amidol a vast ocean, isolated from the rest of the world.
